headers.subject: Cannot specify strutsconfigxml version ????
headers.received: from hermes.apache.org (HELO mail.apache.org) (209.237.227.199) by minotaur-2.apache.org with SMTP; 3 Sep 2004 01:51:31 -0000
headers.received-spf: pass (hermes.apache.org: domain of eric138@gmail.com designates 64.233.170.204 as permitted sender)

by mproxy.gmail.com with SMTP id 80so275830rnk for <users@maven.apache.org>; Thu, 02 Sep 2004 18:51:20 -0700 (PDT)

body.para: I tried to specify "maven.xdoclet.webdoclet.strutsconfigxml.0.Version=1.2" in build.properties. But it seems no effective. After the struts-conf.xml be generated. The DOCTYPE is always like the following:
<!DOCTYPE struts-config PUBLIC "-//Apache Software Foundation//DTD Struts Configuration 1.0//EN" "http://jakarta.apache.org/struts/dtds/struts-config_1_0.dtd">
In fact, I tried to set the version to 1.1, it is the same result as above. Is it a bug or something else ???

I define the properties as following: maven.xdoclet.webdoclet.strutsconfigxml.0=true maven.xdoclet.webdoclet.strutsconfigxml.0.Version=1.2 maven.xdoclet.webdoclet.strutsconfigxml.0.validateXML=false
maven.xdoclet.webdoclet.strutsconfigxml.0.destDir=${maven.build.dir}/${pom.artifactId}/WEB-INF/conf maven.xdoclet.webdoclet.strutsconfigxml.0.mergeDir=${maven.src.dir}/merges
